```{=html}
    <div class="row justify-content-center mt-4">
      <div class="col-md-6 offset-md-3">

          <h3><i class="bi bi-journal-richtext"></i> Subscribe to our Substack newsletter</h3>
          <p>Get the latest event updates, tech insights, and exclusive content delivered to your inbox.</p>
          <!-- Substack embed code -->
          <iframe src="https://alinmechenici.substack.com/embed" width="100%" height="320" style="border:1px solid #EEE; background:white;" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Scripts for event functionality -->
<script>
  // Handle announcement bar close button
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const closeButton = document.querySelector('.announcement-close');
    const announcementBar = document.querySelector('.announcement-bar');

    if (closeButton && announcementBar) {
      closeButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
        announcementBar.style.display = 'none';
        // Save to session storage so it stays closed during the session
        sessionStorage.setItem('announcementClosed', 'true');
      });

      // Check if announcement was previously closed
      if (sessionStorage.getItem('announcementClosed') === 'true') {
        announcementBar.style.display = 'none';
      }
    }

    // Handle calendar downloads
    const calendarButtons = document.querySelectorAll('a[download][href$=".ics"]');

    calendarButtons.forEach(button => {
      button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();

        // Get event details from the card
        const card = this.closest('.card');
        const title = card.querySelector('.card-title').textContent;
        const dateText = card.querySelector('.badge').textContent;
        const description = card.querySelector('p').textContent;

        // Find location element without using jQuery-specific selectors
        const locationElement = Array.from(card.querySelectorAll('p strong')).find(el =>
          el.textContent.includes('Location:')
        );
        const location = locationElement ? locationElement.parentNode.textContent.replace('Location:', '').trim() : '';

        // Parse date (simple implementation, would need better parsing for production)
        let startDate, endDate;
        if (dateText.includes('-')) {
          const dates = dateText.split('-');
          // This is a very simplified date parser - would need better parsing in production
          startDate = new Date(dates[0]);
          endDate = new Date(dates[1]);
        } else {
          startDate = new Date(dateText);
          endDate = new Date(startDate);
          endDate.setHours(startDate.getHours() + 2); // Default 2-hour event
        }

        // Generate iCal content
        const icalContent = generateICalEvent(title, startDate, endDate, description, location);

        // Create and trigger download
        const blob = new Blob([icalContent], { type: 'text/calendar;charset=utf-8' });
        const fileName = this.getAttribute('href').split('/').pop();

        // Create download link and trigger it
        const downloadLink = document.createElement('a');
        downloadLink.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
        downloadLink.download = fileName;
        document.body.appendChild(downloadLink);
        downloadLink.click();
        document.body.removeChild(downloadLink);
      });
    });

    // Function to generate iCal format
    function generateICalEvent(title, start, end, description, location) {
      const formatDate = (date) => {
        return date.toISOString().replace(/-|:|\.\d+/g, '');
      };

      return [
        'BEGIN:VCALENDAR',
        'VERSION:2.0',
        'PRODID:-//chen.ist//events//EN',
        'CALSCALE:GREGORIAN',
        'BEGIN:VEVENT',
        `SUMMARY:${title}`,
        `DTSTART:${formatDate(start)}`,
        `DTEND:${formatDate(end)}`,
        `DESCRIPTION:${description.replace(/\n/g, '\\n')}`,
        `LOCATION:${location}`,
        'STATUS:CONFIRMED',
        `DTSTAMP:${formatDate(new Date())}`,
        `UID:${Math.random().toString(36).substring(2)}@chen.ist`,
        'END:VEVENT',
        'END:VCALENDAR'
      ].join('\r\n');
    }
  });
</script>
```
